Template Struct model_constants_t¶

  • Defined in File model_constants_t.h

Struct Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
struct model_constants_t¶

Structure for constants of a model. Includes particle constants as well.

Public Functions

model_constants_t(const std::string &tracking_filename, const bool &track_initial_cond)¶
void register_input()¶

Register the model parameters for initial conditions using the forward mode.

void register_input(codi::RealReverse::Tape &tape)¶

Register the model parameters on the tape for codi::RealReverse.

Parameters

  • tape: Tape where the parameters should be registered on.

void get_gradients(std::vector<float_t> &y_single_new, std::vector<std::array<double, num_par>> &y_diff) const¶

Evaluate the gradients in forward mode. Used to track initial conditions.

void get_gradients(std::vector<float_t> &y_single_new, std::vector<std::array<double, num_par>> &y_diff, codi::RealReverse::Tape &tape) const¶

Register output on tape, evaluate it, get all gradients and reset the tape.

void get_gradient(std::array<double, num_par> &out_vec, std::vector<float_t> &y_single_new, uint32_t ii) const¶

Get the gradients of all its members. You need to register them on a tape before to get meaningful values in the backward mode.

Parameters

  • out_vec: On out: Stores all gradients.

void setup_cloud_autoconversion(particle_model_constants_t<float_t> &pc)¶

Put any perturbed parameter to a property tree. This will compare the parameters to the constants available in constants.h, assuming this is only called during checkpoint writing.

@params ptree Property tree, where a tree “model_constants” is being added. Setup the cloud autoconversion parameters.

Parameters

  • pc: Model constants for a certain particle type.

void setup_model_constants(const input_parameters_t &input, const reference_quantities_t &ref_quant)¶

Setup all model constants and gamma tables including dependent constants.

Parameters

  • input:

  • ref_quant:

void setup_dependent_model_constants(const reference_quantities_t &ref_quant)¶

Setup dependent variables.

Parameters

  • ref_quant:

void set_uncertainty()¶

Set the uncertainty for every parameter. Currently it is only 10% for each parameter.

void set_dt(const double dt_prime, const reference_quantities_t &ref_quant)¶

Set time step from input netcdf file.

void print()¶

Print all parameters that are being tracked with algorithmic differentiation.

bool trace_check(const int &idx, const int state_param) const¶

Check if a certain model state variable or model parameter should be written to the output.

Parameters

  • idx: Index of the model state variable or model parameter to check.

  • state_param: 0: idx is a model parameter 1: idx is a model state variable 2: idx is an initial condition

void load_configuration(const std::string &filename)¶

Define which data shall be written by loading a configuration file.

Parameters

  • filename: Path to json configuration file

int from_json(const nlohmann::json &j)¶

Public Members

std::string id¶

Initial id of this simulation. Emerging ensembles from this have other ids which are set by reading a checkpoint file.

uint64_t ensemble_id¶

Running id for the ensembles starting from this instance.

uint64_t traj_id¶

Running id for the trajectory in this ensemble.

uint64_t max_n_trajs¶

Maximum number of trajectories in every ensemble. Needed to write proper output files.

uint64_t n_trajs¶

Number of trajectories in the current ensemble.

uint64_t n_ensembles¶

Total number of ensembles.

std::string ens_desc¶

Description of the ensemble i.e. “root - 0,0 perturb ccn_a1 - 1,3 perturb cloud_max_x” where the first number is the ensemble id, the second number is the trajectory it originates from

double alpha_d¶

Accomodation coefficient
